description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.On2ZrPJTe8FURsXY]{Operative Exploit}

When calculating the Athletics check DC to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.iLlBAZBfHJMZQRQx#jump]{Jump}, treat the total distance youâ€™re trying to jump as though it were reduced by an amount equal to half your land speed bonus granted by the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.cymsh0UZpmJB0cQK]{Quick Movement} operative ability. As long as your jump brings you in contact with a solid surface like a wall or large piece of debris, you can spend 1 Resolve Point to immediately jump again from that surface as part of the same move action as though you had a running start; only after resolving this second jump do you fall if not on a surface that can support you.
